 If you have experience working in Agile/SCRUM environments, especially with distributed teams, and are eager to work with cutting-edge cloud technologies, this role is for you.

 and

 ,

 .

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
**Position: Senior DevOps Engineer** 




**Location: Sweden** 




**Job Type: [Full-time/Part-time/Contract]** 




  





**About Us:** 




 DataBees is seeking a skilled Senior DevOps Engineer to join our team for an exciting client project. We are committed to delivering solutions and optimizing our development processes. If you are passionate about automation and enhancing team collaboration, we want to hear from you!
 



  





**Responsibilities:** 




  





 Design, implement, and manage CI/CD pipelines to automate deployment processes.
 



 Collaborate with development teams to streamline workflows and enhance software delivery.
 



 Utilize GitHub Enterprise for version control and collaboration on code repositories in enterprise projects.
 



 Develop and maintain containerized applications using Docker.
 



 Write scripts and tools in Bash and Python to automate routine tasks and improve efficiency.
 



 Implement and manage infrastructure as code using Terraform to streamline deployment processes and enhance system reliability.
 



 Manage and configure Ab Initio tools and components to support data integration, transformation, and analytics workflows.
 



 Monitor and troubleshoot system performance and issues within production environments.
 



 Assist in data migration processes, ensuring data integrity and security.
 



 Work closely with data lake platform teams to align DevOps practices with project requirements.
 



  





**Qualifications:** 




  





 Strong understanding of CI/CD methodologies and automation tools.
 



 Proven experience with Azure DevOps,Terraform,GitHub Enterprise, Docker, Bash, and Python.
 



 Familiarity with Azure DevOps and Ab Initio Admin is a plus.
 



 Experience in data migration projects is desirable.
 



 Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team environment.
 



 Strong communication skills and attention to detail.
 



  





**Preferred Skills:** 




  





 Knowledge of cloud platforms (e.g., Azure, AWS) and their DevOps services.
 



 Experience with Data bricks and Unity Catalog.
 



 Experience with monitoring and logging tools (e.g., Prometheus, Grafana).
 



 Understanding of infrastructure as code (IaC) principles and tools (e.g., Terraform, Ansible).
 



  





**How to Apply:** 




 If you are a motivated DevOps professional looking to make an impact, please submit your resume and a cover letter to surat.priya@databees.ai with the subject line "Senior DevOps Engineer Application."
 



  





**Application Deadline: 27.10.2024**

title: Data Engineer - AWS, Redshift, Python & SQL
description:
**About Us**
 Sinch is a global leader in cloud communications, helping businesses connect with their customers on mobile phones. We facilitate over 147 billion conversations annually, reaching every phone on Earth. Our technology powers the world's leading communication platforms.
   

  

 We are a dynamic and innovative team seeking a passionate Data Engineer to collaborate on our data pipeline and data warehousing solutions.
   

  

 The working model is hybrid, and you can work from our Stockholm or Malmo office.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Develop and maintain scalable, resilient data pipelines using AWS services such as Lambda, Step Functions, Redshift, and S3.
* Improve and maintain the Redshift data warehouse solution.
* Manage the data lifecycle from ingestion and processing to storage and retrieval.
* Work with a range of different technologies and programming languages, with a primary focus on Python and SQL.
* Actively contribute to enhancing our data processes and pipelines.
* Take a hands-on approach to monitoring production environments, identifying issues, and being on-call when necessary.
* Engage closely with data scientists, software engineers, architects, DevOps specialists, and product managers to deliver exceptional data solutions.
* Build and maintain visualizations and dashboards in Tableau.


**Requirements**
* Capable of developing, maintaining, and optimizing data pipelines for enhanced performance and reliability.
* Experienced professional in team-based software development and deployment.
* Skilled in using SQL for data querying and ETL/ELT development.
* Experienced in data warehousing (Redshift) and data modelling.
* In-depth knowledge of AWS services including Lambda, Step Functions, Redshift, and S3.
* Ability to work effectively within a cross-functional self-organizing team, fostering collaboration and mutual respect among team members.
* A passion for writing clean and efficient code.
* Strong written and verbal communication skills in English.
* Bachelor's degree in computer science, data engineering, or related technical discipline.


 Good to have
   

  

* Knowledgeable about various data architectures such as Data Lake, Data Mesh, and Data Fabric.
* Experience in data visualization tools.
* Knowledge in or willing to learn infrastructure as code using Terraform.
* Experience in a similar industry or related one.
* Proven ability to work with others to solve tough technical problems.
* Ability to thrive in a dynamic and fast-paced work environment characteristic of agile development methodologies.
* Experience guiding and mentoring fellow engineers, empowering them to contribute effectively to team goals.


 Embrace the challenge and join us!

title: DevOps Engineer till spännande projekt inom bank- och finanssektorn
description:
Vill du vara en del av en stor teamleverans till en av HiQs största kunder? Vill du jobba med branschens mest kompetenta kollegor, i en miljö med stora utvecklingsmöjligheter? Vill du vara med och forma ett samhällskritiskt system med allt vad det innebär?
   

  

 Just nu är vi i uppstarten av en spännande satsning till ett projekt inom bank- och finanssektorn, och vi söker därför fler skarpa kollegor som vill vara med på resan och utvecklandet av ett nytt samhällskritiskt system.
   

  

 Som en av oss på HiQ får du inte bara möjlighet att jobba med kompetenta kollegor och utvecklade uppdrag, du får även ett kontor med stark teamanda, fantastisk utsikt över Slussen och en roll där du får diskutera och lösa komplexa situationer tillsammans med dina kollegor.
   

  

**Vi söker dig som har:**
* Minst 5 års erfarenhet av att arbeta med DevOps
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med CI/CD-verktyg, containeriseringsverktyg, molnlösningar, scripting, säkerhet och monitorering
* Relevant utbildning inom IT
* Svenskt medborgarskap och är flytande i svenska och engelska
* Tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta inom bank eller finans (meriterande)


 HiQ är utan tvekan ett av Sveriges mest tekniktunga och spännande konsultbolag med kunder inom en rad olika branscher såsom fordon, fintech, retail, offentlig sektor och telekom. Förutom att vi bidragit till utvecklingen av att snart bli ett kontantlöst samhälle, utvecklar vi även allt från digitaliseringen av elkraftsystem till framtidens autonoma fordon. Enkelt sagt, vi gillar att skapa sådant som förenklar och gör vardagen lite roligare för oss alla.

title: Scrum Master/Project Manager Gen AI
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and IT System Testing and Evaluation
description:
Role Overview: We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Scrum Master/Project Manager to lead the Generative AI (GenAI) project with our client. The ideal candidate will serve as a critical counterpart to the AI Director, playing a pivotal role in ensuring the successful delivery of key GenAI initiatives. This person will be instrumental in managing cross-functionalteams, driving agile methodologies, and ensuring alignment between strategic AI goals andproject execution.
 



 The role requires strong project management and scrum expertise, coupled with a deep understanding of AI technologies and applications, particularly in large-scale industrial or manufacturing environments. Experience from management consulting firms like McKinsey, BCG, or Bain is highly desirable to bring a structured problem-solving and results-oriented approach to the project.
 



 Key Responsibilities:
 



  Project Leadership: Serve as the primary Tech project lead, working in close
 



 collaboration with AI Director to ensure all project milestones are met on
 



 time, within scope, and on budget.
 



  Agile Implementation: Lead daily stand-ups, sprint planning, sprint reviews, and
 



 retrospectives, ensuring the team adheres to agile principles while driving delivery.
 



  Stakeholder Management: Act as the key point of contact for both internal and external
 



 stakeholders, ensuring seamless communication between AI leadership
 



 and the Tech development team.
 



  Team Management: Oversee cross-functional teams, including developers, data
 



 scientists, AI engineers, and business analysts, ensuring collaboration and high-quality
 



 delivery.
 



  Risk Mitigation: Identify, assess, and mitigate project risks, ensuring alignment with
 



 both technical and business objectives.
 



  Continuous Improvement: Foster a culture of continuous improvement, leveraging
 



 agile metrics to optimize project outcomes, team performance, and stakeholder
 



 satisfaction.
 



**Must-Have Skills:** 




 1. Experience in AI/GenAI Projects: Deep understanding of Generative AI architectures,
 



 frameworks (e.g., Azure, OpenAI), and deployment models.
 



 2. Agile Methodology Expertise: Proven track record of leading Agile projects in fast-
 



 paced environments. Certified Scrum Master (CSM) or Project Management
 



 Professional (PMP).
 



 3. Leadership and Stakeholder Management: Exceptional leadership skills with
 



 experience managing complex projects involving multiple stakeholders and cross-
 



 functional teams.
 



 4. Excellent Communication Skills: Ability to convey complex technical concepts to both
 



 technical and non-technical stakeholders clearly and concisely.
 



 5. Risk Management: Expertise in identifying and managing risks in technology and AI
 



 projects, ensuring timely escalation and mitigation.
 



**Good-to-Have Skills:** 




 1. Technical Knowledge: Understanding of DevOps practices, Azure DevOps,
 



 containerization, and CI/CD pipelines.
 



 2. AI Operations: Familiarity with LLMOps, including model governance, monitoring, and
 



 retraining processes.
 



 3. Change Management: Experience in managing large-scale digital transformation
 



 projects, particularly in AI and machine learning domains.
 



 4. Data-Driven Decision Making: Ability to use agile metrics and data analytics to inform
 



 decisions and improve processes.
 



 5. Experience in Manufacturing or Industrial Contexts: Experience with AI use cases
 



 specific to manufacturing industries (e.g., predictive maintenance, digital twin
 



 technologies, or autonomous systems).

title: DevSecOps System Administrator / Engineer | SEB, Stockholm
Linux Specialist
description:
Är du en passionerad Linux-specialist som brinner för IT-infrastruktur och automation? Vill du arbeta med de senaste teknologierna inom Linux och cloud, och bidra till att forma morgondagens IT-lösningar? Då kan den här möjligheten vara perfekt för dig!
 



 Vi söker dig som är väl bevandrad inom Linux-miljöer och vill ta en central roll i att driva vår IT-infrastruktur framåt. Du kommer att arbeta "hands on" med allt från implementation och drift till avancerad felsökning i komplexa Linux-miljöer. Vi söker en person som motiveras av att lösa problem, är serviceinriktad och har en genuin teknisk nyfikenhet.
 



 I den här rollen kommer du att vara en viktig del i att utveckla och upprätthålla våra kunders Linux-infrastruktur. Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden omfattar serverdrift, automation, säkerhet och nätverkshantering. Du kommer att arbeta nära både interna och externa parter för att säkerställa robusta, skalbara och säkra lösningar.
 



**Ansvarsområden:** 



* Drift, underhåll och administration av Linux-baserade system (Red Hat, Ubuntu, CentOS eller liknande).
* Automatisering av processer med hjälp av verktyg som Ansible, Puppet eller Chef.
* Design och implementation av Infrastructure as Code (IaC) med hjälp av Terraform, Bash, eller liknande verktyg.
* Hantering av containerplattformar som Docker och orkestrering med Kubernetes.
* Säkerhetshantering och övervakning av system med hjälp av verktyg som Prometheus, Grafana och ELK/EFK-stacken.
* Konfiguration och underhåll av nätverkskomponenter (VPN, brandväggar, routing).
* Implementering och hantering av CI/CD-pipelines för automatiserade lösningar (Jenkins, GitLab CI, eller liknande).
* Molnintegrering och administration (AWS, Azure, Google Cloud Platform).



**Vi ser att du har erfarenhet av:** 



* Flera års erfarenhet av Linux-administration och felsökning i produktionsmiljöer.
* Erfarenhet av containerteknologier som Docker och Kubernetes.
* Automatisering och scripting med Bash, Python eller andra scripting-språk.
* Erfarenhet av molntjänster (AWS, GCP, Azure) och hybridmiljöer.
* God förståelse för nätverk och säkerhet inom Linux-miljöer.
* Verktyg för övervakning och logghantering (Prometheus, Grafana, ELK/EFK).
* CI/CD-processer och verktyg för automatiserad driftsättning (Jenkins, GitLab CI).



**Meriterande:** 



* Erfarenhet av databashantering (MySQL, PostgreSQL, MongoDB).
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med DevOps-metodologier och verktyg.
* Certifieringar inom Linux (t.ex. RHCE, LFCS) eller molnplattformar (AWS Certified, Azure Solutions Architect).
* Erfarenhet av säkerhetslösningar som SELinux, AppArmor och certifikathantering.



**Personliga egenskaper:** 



* Systematisk och noggrann med en stark analytisk förmåga.
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt och i team, med fokus på att leverera lösningar av högsta kvalitet.
* En naturlig problemlösare som trivs i en dynamisk och snabbt föränderlig miljö.
* Mycket god kommunikationsförmåga i både svenska och engelska, i tal och skrift.



 Hos Camai kommer du att få möjlighet att växa i din roll och arbeta med spännande projekt inom Linux och IT-infrastruktur. Om du är redo för en ny utmaning där du kan fördjupa dig i den senaste tekniken och ta din karriär till nästa nivå, ser vi fram emot din ansökan! 
 



**Start** 
 : Omgående start med hänsyn till uppsägningstid. Uppdraget är på heltid och är tillsvidare
   





**Placeringsort:** 
 Stockholm
 



**Ansökan:** 
 Intervjuer sker löpande och tillsättning sker vid rätt match
   

  





**Vad vi står för:**
 Vi på Camai erbjuder ett av marknadens branschledande anställningsvillkor med stor frihet som ledord. Vi drivs av att hitta det bästa uppdraget för våra medarbetare. Det roligaste som finns är att hitta en perfekt matchning mellan konsult och kund. Vi vet att alla har ett drömarbete, och vi är ett tight entreprenörsdrivet team som arbetar för att se till att du tycker att det är roligt att gå till jobbet, varje dag. Vi tror att kompetenta människor dras till varandra och vill jobba med likasinnade i spännande kunduppdrag.
 



 Vi har en av marknadens mest förmånliga ersättningsmodell anpassad för en modern konsultorganisation med mycket frihet. Vi har helt enkelt kul tillsammans!
   





**Varför ska du välja oss?**
 Med många års erfarenhet i konsultbranschen har vi valt våra tre värdeord med omsorg; kommunikation, ambition och balans. För att lyckas tror vi att våra medarbetare får vara med och forma sitt arbete efter prioriteringar och intresse i livet. Med din ambition och rätt verktyg från oss ser vi till att du utvecklas och samtidigt belönas på vägen.
   





*Vill du vara en del av vår fortsatta tillväxt?*

title: Integration Specialist
description:
**Company Description**
***Statistics show that women and underrepresented groups tend to apply to jobs only if they meet 100% of the qualifications. Sobi encourages you to change that statistic and apply. Rarely do candidates meet 100% of the qualifications. We look forward to your application!***
 At Sobi, each person brings their unique talents to work as a team and make a difference. We are dedicated to developing and delivering innovative therapies to improve the lives of people who live with a rare disease. Our edge comes from our team of people and our commitment to patients.
   

  

 Here At Sobi, Our Mission And Culture Get Us Excited To Come To Work Every Day, But Here Are a Few More Reasons To Join Our Team
   

  

* Competitive compensation for your work
* Emphasis on work/life balance
* Collaborative and team-oriented environment
* Opportunities for professional growth
* Diversity and Inclusion
* Making a positive impact to help ultra-rare disease patients who are in need of life saving treatments


**Job Description**
 The main responsibilities of the role include:
   

  

* Design, implement, and maintain automation and integration solutions for various IT and business processes, such as deployment, testing, and monitoring.
* Work closely with other team members to understand the requirements and challenges of systems, processes and identify opportunities for automations and integrations using Azure integration services.
* Developing and maintaining CI/CD pipelines for software delivery using Azure DevOps.
* Automating infrastructure provisioning and management using Azure services and PowerShell scripting.
* Monitoring and troubleshooting issues in production environments on Azure.
* Collaborating with development teams and operations teams to improve software delivery processes.
* Ensuring high availability and performance of production systems on Azure.


**Qualifications**
* Strong experience with Azure cloud platform and its services.
* Experience with integration tools and frameworks, such as Azure Integration Services
* Experience with Azure DevOps for CI/CD and developing using Bicep language for deploying Azure resources.
* Experience with infrastructure as code.
* Proficiency in scripting languages such as PowerShell.
* Proficiency in C# programming language.
* Familiarity with MS SQL or Cosmos DB.
* Excellent communication skills in Swedish and English, both written and verbal, and ability to work well in a team


 The right candidate must be located in Stockholm or nearby.
   

  

**Additional Information**
 All Sobi employees need to demonstrate behaviors in line with Sobi's core values: Care, Ambition, Urgency, Ownership and Partnership. Are you ready to be on the Sobi team? Come join a culture that empowers every person to be the person that makes a difference for rare disease.
   

  

**Why Join Us?**
 We are a global company with over 1,700 employees in more than 30 countries and are committed to the societies where we operate. With a deeply skilled management team directing our day-to-day wins, and a Board with a stellar track record, we’re ready to take on the world’s diseases, ailments and adversity. Our people believe they have the power to make a positive impact in others’ lives because that’s exactly what we do here. If you’re seeking a career that taps into your talents in a way that makes the world a better, healthier place, we just may have a job for you.
   

  

 We know our employees are our most valuable asset, and our culture conveys that. We offer a competitive benefits package, to support the health and happiness of our staff.
   

  

**Sobi Culture**
 At Sobi, we refuse to accept the status quo. This is because we have witnessed first-hand the challenges facing those affected by rare diseases, and have used this knowledge to shape our business to find new ways of helping them.
   

  

 As a specialized biopharmaceutical company, we are dedicated to rare diseases. And we see this focus as a strength. By effectively turning our research into ground-breaking treatments, we help make medicine more accessible and open up more possibilities for patients and more opportunities for those caring for them. This has been our approach since day one, but we know we can’t change the world of rare diseases on our own. Accomplishing this requires strong partnerships with patients, partners and stakeholders across the entire value chain. Together, we define how our business can create solutions that serve the needs of those affected by rare diseases while facilitating sustainable growth.
   

  

**An Equal Opportunity Employer**
 Sobi is an Equal Opportunity Employer and prohibits discrimination and harassment of any kind. All employment decisions at Sobi are based on business needs, job requirements and individual qualifications, without regard to race, color, religion or belief, national, social or ethnic origin, sex (including pregnancy), age, physical, mental or sensory disability, HIV Status, sexual orientation, gender identity, protected veterans and/or expression, marital, civil union or domestic partnership status, past or present military service, family medical history or genetic information, family or parental status, or any other status or protected groups by the laws or regulations in the locations where we operate.

title: Junior Backend Engineer
company_industry: Software Development, Financial Services, and Technology, Information and Internet
description:
**The Company**
 PayPal has been revolutionizing commerce globally for more than 25 years. Creating innovative experiences that make moving money, selling, and shopping simple, personalized, and secure, PayPal empowers consumers and businesses in approximately 200 markets to join and thrive in the global economy.
   

  

 We operate a global, two-sided network at scale that connects hundreds of millions of merchants and consumers. We help merchants and consumers connect, transact, and complete payments, whether they are online or in person. PayPal is more than a connection to third-party payment networks. We provide proprietary payment solutions accepted by merchants that enable the completion of payments on our platform on behalf of our customers.
   

  

 We offer our customers the flexibility to use their accounts to purchase and receive payments for goods and services, as well as the ability to transfer and withdraw funds. We enable consumers to exchange funds more safely with merchants using a variety of funding sources, which may include a bank account, a PayPal or Venmo account balance, PayPal and Venmo branded credit products, a credit card, a debit card, certain cryptocurrencies, or other stored value products such as gift cards, and eligible credit card rewards. Our PayPal, Venmo, and Xoom products also make it safer and simpler for friends and family to transfer funds to each other. We offer merchants an end-to-end payments solution that provides authorization and settlement capabilities, as well as instant access to funds and payouts. We also help merchants connect with their customers, process exchanges and returns, and manage risk. We enable consumers to engage in cross-border shopping and merchants to extend their global reach while reducing the complexity and friction involved in enabling cross-border trade.
   

  

 Our beliefs are the foundation for how we conduct business every day. We live each day guided by our core values of Inclusion, Innovation, Collaboration, and Wellness. Together, our values ensure that we work together as one global team with our customers at the center of everything we do – and they push us to ensure we take care of ourselves, each other, and our communities.
   

  

**Job Description Summary:**
 As PayPal continues its mission to revolutionize commerce, we are on the lookout for a dynamic Junior Backend Engineer with a DevOps mindset to join one of our teams at the forefront of shaping innovative solutions and crafting modern products that positively impact our merchants' lives. Curious to learn more? Keep scrolling!
   

  

**Job Description:**
 PayPal in Sweden originated from Zettle, focusing on commerce services targeting small and medium businesses, and is now expanding to contribute to the wider PayPal portfolio.
   

  

**Meet our team**
 As a Junior Backend Engineer, you'll will join a cross functional team and collaborate closely with a diverse group of talented individuals from engineering, product, and design to create solutions that power PayPal's customer experiences.
   

  

**Your way to impact**
 Joining us means partnering with Product and Design counterparts who share a commitment to enhancing our merchants' daily experiences. Here, you will have the opportunity to:
   

  

* Continuously innovate and deliver awesome experiences for our users Solve the real customer problems through technology.
* Demonstrate and sharpen your problem-solving skills in both day-to-day work as well as during lab days and hack weeks.
* Co-elaborate with your peers across our Backend Engineering chapter, working on platform improvements and increasing learning opportunities for and creating opportunities for growth in a supportive environment.


**Your day to day**
* Develop clean, maintainable, high-quality Java code.
* Take ownership of the delivery – your own, and your peer engineers in the team.
* Design, build, deploy, and maintain services powering PayPal's customer experiences.
* Collaborate with other engineers on the team (Java / Kotlin Backend, iOS, Android and QA) as well as product and design to deliver a world-class experience.
* Continuously raise the bar on the quality and customer focus in the products we develop.


**What You Need To Succeed**
* Practical experience of developing back-end services in Java and/or Kotlin.
* Focus on delivery, attention to detail and quality of the end result.
* First experience of designing, building and maintaining distributed systems in a cloud-native environment.
* First exposure to working in an agile development team, using common tools like Jira and GitHub.
* Examples of growing yourself and/or people around you – learning from others and sharing your knowledge, experiences and opinions.
* Knowledge / Interest in cloud infrastructure (we primarily use AWS).


**Get bonus points if you also have...**
* Familiarity with FinTech industry payment transactions.


**We Believe in You**
 Interested? Don't hesitate to apply or/and let's talk – we'd love to get to know you!
   

  

 \_
   

  

 For the majority of employees, PayPal's balanced hybrid work model offers 3 days in the office for effective in-person collaboration and 2 days at your choice of either the PayPal office or your home workspace, ensuring that you equally have the benefits and conveniences of both locations.
   

  

**Our Benefits:**
 At PayPal, we’re committed to building an equitable and inclusive global economy. And we can’t do this without our most important asset—you. That’s why we offer benefits to help you thrive in every stage of life. We champion your financial, physical, and mental health by offering valuable benefits and resources to help you care for the whole you.
   

  

 We have great benefits including a flexible work environment, employee shares options, health and life insurance and more. To learn more about our benefits please visit https://www.paypalbenefits.com
   

  

**Who We Are:**
 To learn more about our culture and community visit https://about.pypl.com/who-we-are/default.aspx
   

  

**Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**
 PayPal provides equal employment opportunity (EEO) to all persons regardless of age, color, national origin, citizenship status, physical or mental disability, race, religion, creed, gender, sex, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity and/or expression, genetic information, marital status, status with regard to public assistance, veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by federal, state, or local law. In addition, PayPal will provide reasonable accommodations for qualified individuals with disabilities. If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at paypalglobaltalentacquisition@paypal.com.
   

  

**Belonging at PayPal:**
 Our employees are central to advancing our mission, and we strive to create an environment where everyone can do their best work with a sense of purpose and belonging. Belonging at PayPal means creating a workplace with a sense of acceptance and security where all employees feel included and valued. We are proud to have a diverse workforce reflective of the merchants, consumers, and communities that we serve, and we continue to take tangible actions to cultivate inclusivity and belonging at PayPal.
   

  

 Any general requests for consideration of your skills, please Join our Talent Community.
   

  

 We know the confidence gap and imposter syndrome can get in the way of meeting spectacular candidates. Please don’t hesitate to apply.
   

  

 REQ ID R0116609

title: Platform Engineer
company_industry: Financial Services, Software Development, and Banking
description:
*Är du en engagerad CI/CD-plattformsutvecklare med en passion för att bygga robusta och pålitliga plattformar? Vi söker nu en ny kollega som vill bidra till utvecklingen av Avanzas leveransplattform!* 




  





 För närvarande består Leveransplattformsteamet av tre plattformsutvecklare och en produktägare, och vi vill nu förstärka teamet med ytterligare en utvecklare. Teamets mål är att skapa verktyg och processer som underlättar för våra 30+ utvecklingsteam att snabbt och säkert kunna ta sina system från utveckling till produktion med minimala ledtider. Våra system består idag av cirka 1800 applikationer och tjänster som körs on-prem i över 8000 instanser. En central del av teamets uppdrag är att utforma en välfungerande CI/CD- process för denna miljö.
 



  





 I dagsläget ansvarar och förvaltar teamet en on-prem lösning. Men då Avanza står inför en resa mot molnet, kommer du, tillsammans med ditt team, att vara starkt involverad och drivande i arbetet med att utveckla framtidens leveransplattform i molnet.
 



  





**Om tjänsten** 




 Som plattformsutvecklare i Leveransplattformsteamet kommer du, tillsammans med teamet, att ha ett helhetsansvar för leveranser i vår teknikplattform. Det innebär bland annat att utveckla system, ramverk, verktyg och riktlinjer som gör det möjligt för våra team att smidigt utveckla, kvalitetssäkra och sätta sina tjänster i produktion.
 



  





 Våra team har en hög grad av autonomi, vilket för Leveransplattformsteamet betyder att ni tar beslut om leveransplattformens arkitektur och teknikval. Det innebär också att teamet bygger en plattform som stödjer övriga teams autonomi och möjliggör deras fortsatta utveckling.
 



  





**Hos oss kommer du att:** 



* Få en djup förståelse för hur våra system hänger samman och samverkar.
* Ha daglig kontakt med både utvecklingsteamen och driftsteamen.
* Ha stort inflytande över utformningen av framtidens leveransmiljö i molnet.
* Arbeta i en öppen miljö med korta beslutsvägar och utrymme för idéer.
* Utforska nya ramverk och tekniker inom CI/CD och DevOps.



  





**Din profil** 




 Vi tror att du är en driven och erfaren plattformsutvecklare som motiveras av att ta ansvar och se till att saker blir gjorda. Du är även nyfiken och villig att lära dig mer, samtidigt som du är ödmjuk inför det du ännu inte behärskar. Vi lägger stor vikt vid samarbete och arbetar ofta tillsammans för att lösa problem. Teamet har många beröringspunkter med både utvecklings- och driftsteam, vilket ställer krav på god kommunikationsförmåga samt ett vänligt och hjälpsamt bemötande.
 



  





***Vi tror också att du har:***



* Goda kunskaper i svenska i tal och skrift.
* En god förståelse och intresse för att bygga plattformar för andra utvecklare.
* Goda kunskaper om CI/CD, DevOps och Lean
* Erfarenhet inom Java och dess ekosystem.
* Goda kunskaper i verktyg som vanligtvis används inom leveransdomänen (t.ex. Jenkins, Gitlab, Maven).
* Erfarenhet av containers samt Kubernetes.
* Erfarenhet av molnbaserade lösningar.



  





***Meriterande är:***



* Erfarenhet av att drifta IT-system
* Erfarenhet av tidigare migrationer från on-prem till molnet



  





**Ansökan:** 




 Skicka gärna din ansökan snarast då urvalet sker löpande, dock senast den
 **24** 
**November** 
 . Vi tar inte emot ansökningar via mejl p.g.a. GDPR.
 



  





 Välkommen med din ansökan!
 



  





*Erbjudanden från rekryteringsföretag/annonssäljare undanbedes.*

title: Senior Scrum Master
description:
Vi har nu ett nytt behov och söker därför en konsultkollega med nedan kvalifikationer. Tjänsten är en del av vår konsultverksamhet vilket innebär att du blir anställd av oss och arbetar hos kund alt. interna projekt och åtaganden.
   

  

**Jobbeskrivning**
 Du etablerar goda samarbetsformer med RTE och övriga Scrum Masters i tåget. Du förbereder och leder planeringar och jobbar aktivt med att underlätta kommunikation, koordination och samarbete i såväl teamet, mellan utvecklingsteamen som med verksamheten. Du ansvarar för teamets kontinuerliga utveckling och kunskapsspridning, då ni tillsammans skapar en kultur som engagerar och tar fram det bästa ur varje medarbetare.
   

  

 Du ska vara en del av utvecklingsteamet och vara ansvarig för att:
   

  

 Säkra att teamet följer agila principer, processer och metoder.
   

  

 Facilitera de agila momenten.
   

  

 Undanröja hinder.
   

  

 Representera teamet i Scrum of scrums.
   

  

 Säkerställa att realisationen av kraven fungerar väl med våra lösningar i så väl befintliga som framtida miljöer.
   

  

 Aktiv bidra till att teamet som helhet ökar sin förmåga genom att
   

  

 Säkerställa att hen breddar sin egen kompetens genom kompetensöverföring från övriga teammedlemmarnas på samma sätt som hen ser till att överföra av den egna kompetensen till andra teammedlemmar.
   

  

 Föreslå och aktiv delta i teamutvecklande aktiviteter.
   

  

**Din profil (Skall krav)**
* Minst 8 års erfarenhet av att arbeta som Scrum master
* Cerified SAFe Advanced ScM
* Cerified SAFe 6 Agilist
* Coachning av utvecklingsteam
* Erfarenhet av arbete på myndighet med minst 10.000 medarbetare eller likvärdig organisation.


**Meriterande**
* Erfarenhet av teknisk koordinering, kravanalys eller test
* Erfarenhet som programmering

title: Sofware Intern (Security in Digital Wallets)
description:
**Join us in shaping the future of digital wallets!** 




  





 At iGrant.io, we are at the forefront of the digital wallet revolution, driven by the new
 **eIDAS 2.0** 
 regulations and Implementing Acts shaping and empowering how personal data is controlled across the European Union. These regulations are accelerating the shift towards a trusted digital identity ecosystem, placing digital wallets at the heart of secure and seamless data transactions.
 



  





 We believe in a data-sharing economy where individuals hold the reins of their data. Leveraging advanced Web 3.0 technologies such as
 **self-sovereign identity** 
 ,
 **distributed ledgers** 
 , and
 **blockchain** 
 , we’re creating an ecosystem that enables true personal data control through
 **digital wallets** 
 .
 



  





 Join us in shaping this future of decentralised data ownership, built on secure, privacy-centric innovations!
 



  





**Your Role: Software Interns (Security in Digital Wallets)** 




  





 Are you passionate about technology innovation and security? iGrant.io, a leader in
 **digital wallet solutions** 
 based in Stockholm, is looking for Software Interns eager to explore the security of digital identity wallets further. This is an opportunity to contribute to pioneering projects defining the future of
 **secure transactions** 
 and
 **data sovereignty** 
 in the era of Web 3.0.
 



  





 Apply now and be part of the team revolutionising digital identity in the EU!
 



  





**Your responsibilities:** 



* **Perform** 
 Security analysis, be part of the DevOps
* **Implement Security Protocols** 
 : Assist in developing security measures for safeguarding digital transactions.
* **Develop and Debug Code** 
 : Write, test, and debug code for digital wallet applications.
* **Participate in Software Design** 
 : Engage in project design meetings to discuss and contribute to software solutions.



  





**Key qualifications:** 



* Finished or soon finishing Bachelor's or Master's in computer science, information technology, mathematics, or related fields. Any studies in Security are an added plus.
* Fluent in English;
 **communication skills in Swedish is a prerequisite** 
 .



  





**What we offer:** 



* Develop your expertise in leading-edge cloud technology and digital wallets/web 3.0 technologies.
* A remote-first work environment that promotes flexibility.
* Opportunity to learn and grow internationally alongside experts well-versed in web 3.0, ledgers, and blockchain technologies.
* Be part of an innovative startup with a mission to bring trust and transparency to the internet.



  





**Ready to shape the future? Apply Now!** 




  





**About us:** 




 iGrant.io is a rapidly fast-growing digital wallet company based out of Stockholm, Sweden, on a mission to make a meaningful impact on society by establishing trust and transparency between organisations and their consumers - a fundamental requirement for a fully functioning data-sharing economy.
 



  





**Join us in shaping the future of data. Send your application to** 
 jobs@igrant.io today!
 



  





 Situated within Stockholm, LCubed AB (iGrant.io), Sweden provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants without regard to race, colour, religion, sex, sexual orientation, marital status, pregnancy, parental status, national origin, ethnic background, age, disability, political opinion, social status, veteran status, union membership, or genetics.

title: Senior Azure Administrator
description:
We now have a new need and are therefore looking for a consulting colleague with the qualifications below. The position is part of our consulting services, which means you will be employed by us and work with clients or internal projects and assignments.
   

  

**Job Description**
* As a part of this team, you will be focusing on cloud infrastructure provisioning, administration, automation, configuring security policies, bringing initiatives to opti-mize cost etc
* Performing security assessment of cloud resources and taking initiatives to improve security posture
* Communicating with stakeholders and help to migrate their workloads to a new Enterprise Scale environment


**Technical Skills & Expertise:**
* Strong hands-on experience in managing Azure infra-structure
* Experience in deploying cloud resources using Infrastruc-ture as Code (IaC) e.g. Terraform, Ansible
* Experience in AKS administration (networking, security, policy, automation, etc) and deploying CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions/Azure DevOps)
* Identify potential threats and weaknesses of existing cloud infrastructure and conduct regular security assess-ments
* Experience in HashiCorp Vault or similar tools will be an added advantage


**Qualifications/Requirements:**
* Minimum 4+ years of experience in Azure cloud administration and total 7+ years of managing IT infrastructure
* Good to have 2+ years of experience in implementing IaC, Kubernetes and CI/CD pipelines
* Must be AZ-104 certified. AZ-500 and AZ-700 will be add-ed advantage


**Desired Characteristics:**
* Experience working in Agile & DevOps environments
* Good to have experience in managing complex cloud in-frastructure
* Passionate for taking initiative and eager to learn and de-velop their cloud/DevOps skills
* Team player and comfortable conducting knowledge transfer sessions within the team and with stakeholders


**Application deadline:** 
 28-10-2024
   

  

**About Us**
 We currently employ experienced consultants in areas such as System Development, AI, Machine Learning, Testing, Cloud, Infra DevOps, and IT Project Management.
   

  

 Working at Deploja is something entirely different from working at an ordinary consulting company—and we are really proud of that. So, what makes us unique?
   

  

 We simply offer more than just a high salary and greater freedom; that’s just the beginning. With us, you’ll find the work environment and opportunities you deserve. Welcome to Deploja, where the grass is indeed greener!
   

  

**Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**
 🚀 Exciting assignments with our many clients. We focus on long-term projects, which gives you the opportunity to create value for the client while also developing yourself.
   

  

 🌟 A secure monthly salary – together we’ll agree on a base salary depending on your assignments.
   

  

 🚗 Company car – we encourage you to choose an electric car for a more sustainable future.
   

  

 💼 Occupational pension and great opportunities for salary conversion.
   

  

 🌴 Vacation – Would you like more than 30 days of vacation, perhaps 60 days?
   

  

 🏥 Private health insurance, accident insurance, and life insurance for increased security.
   

  

 📚 Skills development – you set your own budget and choose the training you wish to attend.
   

  

 🕑 Quality of life – Are you struggling to balance everyday life and wish to work a little less while still earning as much, if not more?
   

  

*We handle applications continuously, and due to the high workload, it's especially important to include a short motivation for the position, explaining how you meet the requirements.*

title: Data Engineering Consultant
description:
Är du en erfaren Data Engineer med en passion för att bygga och optimera avancerade lösningar? Vi på Northridge Analytics söker dig som vill vara med och forma framtidens datadrivna och AI-baserade lösningar i ett innovativt och snabbt växande team.
 



  
 



**Om Oss:** 
 På Northridge Analytics levererar vi skräddarsydda, datadrivna insikter som hjälper våra kunder att fatta strategiska beslut och uppnå mätbara affärsresultat. Vi arbetar över flera sektorer och branscher, med fokus på att utnyttja den senaste tekniken för att skapa värde för våra kunder.
 



  
 



**Roll & Ansvarsområden:** 
 Som Data Engineer hos oss kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att designa, bygga och underhålla robusta och skalbara dataarkitekturer. Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden inkluderar:
 



  
 


* Designa, utveckla och optimera komplexa dataarkitekturer och pipelines på plattformar som
 **Databricks** 
 ,
 **Snowflake** 
 och
 **Apache Spark** 
 .
* Säkerställa hög datakvalitet, integritet och säkerhet över olika datalagringslösningar och molnplattformar som
 **AWS** 
 ,
 **Azure** 
 och
 **Google Cloud** 
 .
* Samarbeta med data scientists, analytiker och andra intressenter för att identifiera och stödja deras databehov genom att tillhandahålla tillförlitliga och välstrukturerade datalösningar.
* Implementera och övervaka
 **data governance** 
 -strategier, säkerhetsprotokoll och efterlevnad.
* Identifiera och lösa datarelaterade problem samt kontinuerligt förbättra arbetsflöden och processer.
* Bygga automatiserade processer för dataintegration och transformation i en DevOps- och CI/CD-miljö.



  
 



**Krav:** 
 För att lyckas i rollen som Data Engineer bör du ha:
 



  
 


* Minst 3 års erfarenhet av data engineering och erfarenhet av att arbeta med moderna dataplattformar, som
 **Databricks** 
 och
 **Snowflake** 
 .
* Stark programmeringskunskap i språk som
 **Python** 
 ,
 **R** 
 eller
 **Scala** 
 .
* Erfarenhet av ramverk för storskalig datahantering, som
 **Apache Spark** 
 ,
 **Hadoop** 
 , eller liknande teknologier.
* Djupgående kunskap i
 **SQL** 
 och erfarenhet av att arbeta med både relationsdatabaser (t.ex.
 **PostgreSQL** 
 ,
 **MySQL** 
 ) och NoSQL-databaser.
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med molnplattformar (t.ex.
 **AWS** 
 ,
 **Azure** 
 ,
 **Google Cloud** 
 ), inklusive datalagring och moln-native teknologier.
* God förståelse för
 **ETL/ELT-processer** 
 , datamodellering och realtidsdatahantering.
* Förmåga att arbeta i tvärfunktionella team och en samarbetsinriktad attityd med stark kommunikationsförmåga.
* Problemlösningsförmåga med fokus på detaljer och kvalitet.



  
 



**Vad Vi Erbjuder:** 
 Vi erbjuder dig möjligheten att arbeta i en dynamisk och innovativ miljö, där du kan växa och utvecklas professionellt. Förutom konkurrenskraftig kompensation erbjuder vi:
 


* En kreativ och samarbetsorienterad arbetsplats med stort fokus på innovation.
* Möjlighet att arbeta med den senaste tekniken inom data engineering, som
 **Databricks** 
 ,
 **Snowflake** 
 , och molnteknologier.
* Tillgång till spännande projekt inom flera branscher där dina lösningar kommer att ha en direkt affärspåverkan.
* Ett starkt fokus på professionell utveckling och möjlighet att specialisera sig inom de senaste teknologierna och verktygen.



**Hur Du Ansöker:** 
 Om du brinner för att bygga avancerade och skalbara datalösningar, och vill vara en del av ett team som ligger i framkant inom data och AI, ser vi fram emot att höra från dig! Skicka in ditt CV där du beskriver din relevanta erfarenhet. Ansök via direkt LinkedIn.
 



  
 



**Observera:** 
 Endast kandidater med rätt att arbeta i Sverige och nödvändiga arbetstillstånd kommer att beaktas för denna roll.
